column4: after having modprobe 2 snd cards, how can i switch between them, without having to reboot?
tell your programs to use the other you mean?
id likd to play my ogg (with xmms) with other sound card instead of the 1st one.
in xmms settings you can select your other sound card

i remmeber that you could from when i did though
and is http://pastebin.ca/215616 looks fine to ya?
i changed the mixer to use the 2nd card, but this is always the 1st one to play
sorry mate, i dont think i can help
no problem, we cant be elite in everything.
